name: retrieving_assets
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool opensea_data_query.
Tool description: (Deprecated) Get opensea data without any api key
API description: To retrieve assets from our API, call the `/assets` endpoint with the desired filter parameters.

Auctions created on OpenSea don't use an escrow contract, which enables gas-free auctions and allows users to retain ownership of their items while they're on sale. So this is just a heads up in case you notice some assets from opensea.io not appearing in the API.

owner.description: The wallet address of the owner of the assets. Default is None.

order_direction.description: The order of the results. Can be 'asc' or 'desc'. Default is 'desc'.

asset_contract_address.description: The contract address for the assets. Default is None.

limit.description: The number of assets to return. Default is 20.

collection_slug.description: The collection slug to filter assets. Default is None.

cursor.description: A cursor to paginate results. Default is None.

token_ids.description: Specific token IDs to filter assets. Default is None.

asset_contract_addresses.description: Specific contract addresses to filter assets. Default is None.

collection.description: The collection name to filter assets. Default is 'ongakucraft'.

include_orders.description: Whether to include order information for the assets. Default is None.

collection_editor.description: The editor of the collection to filter assets. Default is None.
